meanings.definition: To be unbecoming or unsuitable for someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Wearing a clown costume to a funeral misbecomes the solemn occasion.
meanings.sent2: It misbecomes a teacher to yell at their students in front of the class.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's attempt to fly misbecomes its usual waddling.
meanings.sent4: The bright pink paint misbecomes the elegant white walls of the mansion.
meanings.sent5: The heavy metal music misbecomes the peaceful atmosphere of the library.

meanings.definition: To not be appropriate or fitting.
meanings.sent1: Using slang words in a formal essay misbecomes the academic writing style.
meanings.sent2: It misbecomes a doctor to show up late for surgery.
meanings.sent3: The cowboy hat misbecomes the astronaut's uniform during the space mission.
meanings.sent4: The loud laughter misbecomes the somber mood of the funeral.
meanings.sent5: The neon green shoes misbecome the black-tie dress code of the event.
